snippet: A wheat germ brand that dates to 1936 is trying to introduce itself to a generation of health-conscious consumers steeped in social media and reintroduce itself to former customers.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column highlights Sun Country Foods' campaign for its Kretschmer Wheat Germ; notes campaign is centered on online and social media and aimed at health-conscious consumers as well as former customers.
lead_paragraph: A wheat germ brand that dates to 1936 is trying to introduce itself to a generation of health-conscious consumers steeped in social media and reintroduce itself to former customers.

headline.seo: Kretschmer Campaign Has More Than a Germ of an Idea
headline.main: Kretschmer Campaign Has More Than a Germ of an Idea
headline.print_headline: Reintroducing a Venerable Brand To Health-Conscious Consumers
